definition: zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither

sentences.english: Sporadic gunfire from insurgents down the main road flies harmlessly overhead.
sentences.chinese: 暴亂分子零星的炮火聲在主街道上空迴盪。

sentences.english: Here are some ideas for spending these time gaps in purpose-filled ways
sentences.chinese: 以下是按照“目標填充法”利用零星時間的一些構思。

sentences.english: After the pit was closed tailings utilization and small fragmentary ore bodies development should be concerned.
sentences.chinese: 礦山閉坑後應繼續勘察開發零星礦體及綜合利用尾礦。

sentences.english: Gunfire could still be heard sporadically.
You know this better than I. I received only sporadic news about it.
sentences.chinese: 你們比我更清楚，而我聽到的只是零星消息。

sentences.english: The wounded every the moment are taken to clinics dotted ingl around city.
sentences.chinese: 目前傷員們只能往零星漫衍在市裏的診所送。

sentences.english: Other scattered races in the region yielded few surprises.
sentences.chinese: 在這個地區零星競選結果大致未出所料。

sentences.english: Saw video of the cherry tree branches scattered on the silver is a little bit to play up the course of events.
sentences.chinese: 那櫻樹枝上翻出的零星的銀光正在點點地渲染着乾坤。

sentences.english: There were woods and few houses along the way.
sentences.chinese: 路旁是一片樹林，還有零零星星的幾所房子。

sentences.english: Enters the shop fragmentarily the customer basic hires the housing primarily.
sentences.chinese: 零零星星進店的顧客基本以出租住房爲主。

sentences.english: You'll find similar anecdotal data in several high-end markets.
sentences.chinese: 你會在好幾個高端市場看到類似的零星數據。

sentences.english: The streets went completely quiet, except for a few barking dogs and the odd gunshot.
sentences.chinese: 街道冷清，只能聽到幾聲狗叫和零星的槍聲。

sentences.english: At the ground level an immense lawn is only interrupted by sandboxes and low vegetation arrangements.
sentences.chinese: 地面層廣袤的草坪被零星的沙盒和低矮的植被點綴。

sentences.english: Several shops looked like they had been looted.
sentences.chinese: 零星的幾家商店看上去像被洗劫過。

sentences.english: I only learned about the incident in dribs and drabs.
sentences.chinese: 關於這個事件，我只是零零星星地聽說了一些。

sentences.english: For the moment, the risk is not hyping the pandemic threat, but underplaying it.
sentences.chinese: 目前，流感沒有大規模流行，但是零星出現。

definition: (of a large number of things) to form an expanse/to cover an area
from time to time/now and then/occasionally/frequently
to mix together (disparate substances)/to mingle/a mix/to be tangled up with
